snippet: The Keystone pipeline is bad energy policy and doesn’t do enough for the economy. President Obama should argue for alternative fuel sources and clean energy jobs.
abstract: Editorial contends that the Keystone pipeline is bad energy policy and would not produce anywhere near the number of jobs that Republicans claim it would; asserts that Pres Obama should lobby forcefully against the project; asserts that it is a perfect opportunity to argue for alternative fuel sources and clean energy jobs.
lead_paragraph: The Keystone pipeline is bad energy policy and doesn’t do enough for the economy. President Obama should argue for alternative fuel sources and clean energy jobs.
